titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament, on Tuesday, the seventh of May, 1689. Published by His Majesties Command.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook and Samuel Helsham assigns of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty; and are to be sold at Ormonde-Key, and at the Colledge-arms in Castle-street.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: page 3 torn at foot with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
